gui.chipsarmorstandmenu.config.ARMOR_STA: ArmorStand Open Menu Use Key Modifier
Modifier key to open the Armor Stand menu with the Use key (Default: Right Click). Default: SHIFT
gui.chipsarmorstandmenu.config.TIMEOUT_S: Armor Stand Menu Timeout in seconds. Default: 30 seconds
gui.chipsarmorstandmenu.config.CURIOS_IT: List of items to add as curios.
